resume.summary: Experienced Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of expertise in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and team leadership. Proven track record of delivering scalable solutions using Python, JavaScript, and modern frameworks. Passionate about mentoring junior developers and driving technical innovation in agile environments.

summary: Led a team of 5 engineers in developing a microservices architecture that improved system scalability by 300%
Architected and implemented a real-time analytics platform serving 10M+ daily active users
Mentored 3 junior developers, resulting in 100% retention and 2 promotions within the team
Reduced deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes by implementing automated CI/CD pipelines
Collaborated with product managers and designers to deliver 12 major features ahead of schedule
Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL
Implemented automated testing suite that increased code coverage from 45% to 95%
Built RESTful APIs serving 500K+ requests per day with 99.9% uptime
Optimized database queries resulting in 40% improvement in application response times
Participated in code reviews and established coding standards for the engineering team
Contributed to development of e-commerce platform handling $2M+ in monthly transactions
Fixed critical bugs and implemented new features using PHP, MySQL, and JavaScript
Collaborated with QA team to ensure high-quality software delivery
Participated in daily standups and sprint planning in an Agile environment
